name: Autumn Reflection
description:
Autumn Reflection for https://itch.io/jam/cozy-autumn-game-jam-2022 by Mattoh.

Take a quick break from the world and journal some quick thoughts in a safe and warm environment, free from distractions.

Credits:

Fire Animation  - https://brullov.itch.io/fire-animation

Grass Model - https://emerald-eel-entertainment.itch.io/low-poly-foliage-pack-001

Tree Model - https://l4m0s.itch.io/27-vegetation-3d-assets

Book - https://kingorkish.itch.io/magical-tome

Tent + fire pit - https://narrenschlag.itch.io/lowpoly-tent

Logs - https://soi.itch.io/medieval-interior-asset-pack

Avid Support - A. Calvert
